agentUtterance.text: Hi there, welcome to the Cymbal Air helpdesk! I can help you find a flight to anywhere in the world. Where would you like to go?
Which city in Brazil would you like to fly to?

userUtterance.text: Don't know, where can I fly to

agentUtterance.text: We fly to many cities in Brazil, including Rio de Janeiro, Sao Paulo, and Brasilia. Which city would you like to fly to?

Rio de Janeiro is a popular tourist destination with beautiful beaches, stunning views, and a vibrant culture. Sao Paulo is a bustling metropolis with a thriving business and cultural scene. Brasilia is the capital of Brazil and a planned city with unique architecture. Which city would you like to fly to?
Got it. Which city are you departing from?
When would you like to fly out?
